message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find something similar at a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $15000 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else. Let me know if you're willing to meet me in the middle!

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $15000 would be a fair price for the product. I understand that you value it higher, but given my budget constraints, I hope you can consider accepting this amount. Thank you for understanding.
